name: Dewa Kirim – WooCommerce Gojek / Gosend
author: Dewa Kirim

sections.description:
GO-JEK is a technology startup based in Indonesia that specialises in logistics. This plugin add feature delivery via gojek for your online store. Simply.

Official Website for WooCommerce Gojek / Gosend Shipping

Working demo are available:

DEMO SITE

Suggestions

If you have suggestions about how to improve WooCommerce Gojek, you can write us so we can bundle them into Dewa Kirim – WooCommerce Gojek.

Documentation

Full documentation is available here
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate Dewa Kirim - WooCommerce Gojek from Plugins page
sections.faq:
What is api key google maps

Google APIs is a set of application programming interfaces (APIs) developed by Google which allow communication with Google Services and their integration to other services.

How can i get my api key

Read How to get your API Key and Activate Google Maps

short_description: Dewa Kirim Gojek add shipping on demand services like gojek features to your website. Needs WooCommerce to work. WooCommerce 3.4.x compatible.
